檕字的基本解释

檕
jì
〔檕梅〕山楂。
桔槔上的横木，一端系重物，一端系水桶，可以上下，亦可以转动，用以取物。

檕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》古詣切，去霽，見。］
［《廣韻》苦奚切，平齊，溪。］
(1)见“檕梅”。
(2)桔槔的横木。一端系重物，一端系水桶，可以上下转动，便于取水。

檕字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檕； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页557第01
【唐韻】古詣切【集韻】吉詣切，?音係。【說文】繘耑木也。　【正字通】糾線小椎，繫絲端而轉機，形如撞鐘椎，故字从?。○按《易·井卦》彖辭汔至变未繘井，則繘乃汲水之綆，檕當爲桔槹上橫木，所以轉機。《方言》註亦云：繘，汲水索。似从經解爲是。　又【唐韻】苦奚切【集韻】牽奚切，?音谿。義同。　又檕梅。木名。見朹字註。　又【類篇】堅奚切，音雞。檕迷，木名。

考證：〔按易井卦彖辭，汔至，未繘井。〕　謹照原文汔至下增变字。
檕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
檕字的起名意思

暂无。

Pao
Basic explanation of words
Pao
jì
〔檕梅〕hawthorn.
The crossbar on the orange has a heavy object at one end and a bucket at the other end. It can be up and down or rotated for fetching objects.
Pao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" ancient legends cut, go to Ji, see. ]
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, level, stream. ]
(1) See "Plum Plum".
(2) Orange crosswood. One end is tied to a heavy object and one end is a bucket, which can be rotated up and down for easy water intake.
Pao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檕; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 557 01
[Tang Yun] Ancient sacred cut [Jiyun] Quixic cut, phonology. [Said the text] The wood is also.　【Zhengzitong】Correcting the small vertebrae, tie the end of the thread and turn around. The shape is like hitting a bell vertebra. ○According to "Yi·Jing Gua", if you change the words to the Wei Wei Jing, then the water is drawn from the water, and the water is considered to be the upper horizontal wood of the orange, so it is a turning point. "Dialect" notes also: 繘, draw water rope. It seems to be right from the classics.　[Tang Yun] bitterly cut and cut [Ji Yun] cut and cut,? Yinxi. The same meaning.　Ya Mei again. Wooden name. See note on the word 朹.　[Classes] Jian Xi cut, sound chicken. Pao fan, wooden name. Textual research: [According to the Yijing hexagram, I will say that it is no longer a well. 〕　I would like to change the word from the original to the next.
Pao
